statements: SELECT * FROM returned_items_feedback WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM returned_items_feedback WHERE customer_id = 2001;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_date FROM returned_items_feedback WHERE item_id = 3001;
SELECT item_id, order_id FROM returned_items_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 4001;
SELECT * FROM returned_items_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM returned_items_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM returned_items_feedback WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM returned_items_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM returned_items_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01' AND feedback_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(feedback_date) AS latest_feedback_date, MIN(feedback_date) AS oldest_feedback_date FROM returned_items_feedback;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedbacks WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM items WHERE return_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, item_id FROM feedbacks WHERE rating < 3.0 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_category = 'Electronics' AND return_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM feedbacks WHERE rating > 4.0;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedbacks WHERE item_id = 102;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_category FROM items WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(rating), item_id, COUNT(feedback_id) FROM feedbacks GROUP BY item_id;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM items ORDER BY item_category DESC, item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = '123';
SELECT return_reason, return_date FROM returned_items ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT item_id, quality_rating FROM product_quality WHERE quality_rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, item_id, return_date FROM returned_items WHERE customer_id = '456' ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = '123456' AND feedback_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM returned_items WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damaged%' AND return_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT item_id, quality_rating FROM product_quality WHERE quality_rating >= 4 ORDER BY quality_rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(return_id) AS return_count FROM returned_items GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(return_id) > 1;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, return_reason FROM customer_feedback LEFT JOIN returned_items ON customer_feedback.customer_id = returned_items.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback, timestamp FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT feedback AS review, returned_item_id FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE returned_item_id > 500;
SELECT * FROM ReturnedItems ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM CustomerDetails WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM Products ORDER BY product_category DESC
SELECT customer_name, feedback, return_date FROM CustomerDetails JOIN CustomerFeedback ON CustomerDetails.customer_id = CustomerFeedback.customer_id
SELECT * FROM ReturnedItems WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM CustomerDetails WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%')
SELECT * FROM returned_items;
SELECT name, category, price FROM items WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT item_id, quality_score FROM product_quality WHERE quality_score > 8;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM returned_items ORDER BY return_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, category, price FROM items WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT item_id, AVG(quality_score) AS average_quality FROM product_quality GROUP BY item_id HAVING average_quality > 8 ORDER BY average_quality DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT customers.name, items.name, feedback.rating FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.id = feedback.customer_id JOIN items ON feedback.item_id = items.id ORDER BY feedback.rating DESC, customers.name ASC, items.name ASC LIMIT 5
